sentence: Israel  suspended  the  work  permits  of  most  Palestinian  laborers  after  Hamas-backed  militants  attacked  Israel  on  Oct.  7,  killing  more  than  1,200  people  and  taking  240  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  authorities.
That  triggered  the  latest  war  between  Israel  and  Hamas  in  Gaza,  where  more  than  27,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  Oct.  7,  according  to  Gaza  health  officials.
